N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 6.3 - Board of visitors

State Regulations

The board of visitors of such school shall have the following
powers and duties: (a) They shall
organize in January of each year by electing a president and a secretary and
shall meet in January, June and September and at such other times as they may
prescribe. (b) They shall keep
themselves informed as to the teaching force, activities and other needs of
such school, and advise with the superintendent thereof in relation
thereto. (c) They shall report to
the commissioner on all matters affecting its welfare, with special reference
to the physical condition of the school plant--repairs, replacements, new
buildings, equipment--and other special needs and activities of such school, and they shall make such recommendations with relation thereto as they shall
deem proper. Notes
